__e: Help me capture your associates, and I'll show you where the vault is.
"Stick 'em up and show me where the vault is."
Whatever's inside that vault, it wants out.
What's stopping us getting into the vault to get the tape?
Yes, possibly ... but I would perhaps not have to break open the safe ... because I could also have a key,
Well, don't you keep it in that little safe at home?
Now, when the case needs work they take it out of the vault, directly across the hall and into the Preservation Room.
Why don't you open the vault?
My safe in my office is filled with evidence against him.
Why were you trying to steal this from the vault in New York?
Everyone else said he had a secret vault in his office.
Yeah, you mess up his hand, you won't be able to open the vault.
If you never see the vault, you'll never know what's in it.
Yes. So that I could show you that the safe isn't the problem.
